Name: Sorbitol
Typical Food Applications: Sugar-free candies, chewing gums, frozen desserts and baked goods

Name: Xylitol
Typical Food Applications: Chewing gum, gum drops and hard candy, pharmaceuticals and oral health products, such as throat lozenges, cough syrups, children’s chewable multivitamins, toothpastes and mouthwashes; used in foods for special dietary purposes

Name: Maltitol
Typical Food Applications: Hard candies, chewing gum, chocolates, baked goods and ice cream

Name: Isomalt
Typical Food Applications: Candies, toffee, lollipops, fudge, wafers, cough drops, throat lozenges

Name: Lactitol
Typical Food Applications: Chocolate, some baked goods (cookies and cakes), hard and soft candy and frozen dairy desserts

Name: Mannitol
Typical Food Applications: Dusting powder for chewing gum, ingredient in chocolate-flavored coating agents for ice cream and confections

Name: Erythritol
Typical Food Applications: Bulk sweetener in low calorie foods

Name:
Hydrogenated
Starch Hydrolysates
(HSH)
Typical Food Applications: Bulk sweetener in low calorie foods, provide sweetness, texture and bulk to a variety of sugarless products

Name: Maltodextrin
Description: Same Glicaemic Index as sugar. Improves mouthfeel.
